description: This file is the entry point for a React-based front-end application. It imports React and ReactDOM, along with CSS styling and the main App component. It initializes the React application by rendering the <App /> component into the DOM element with id 'root' inside a React.StrictMode wrapper.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root React node for rendering in the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders a React component tree into the root.
